description: This file defines a React functional component 'Board' used for rendering a Tic Tac Toe game board. It imports React and a 'Square' component, and defines the props interface 'BoardProps' including the game state and interaction handler. The component renders a styled grid of individual Square components, indicating winning cells and handling user clicks for gameplay.

methods.name: isWinningIndex
methods.description: Helper function to determine if a cell index is part of the winning line.

methods.name: Board
methods.description: React functional component that renders the Tic Tac Toe game board based on given props.
